about.description: I'd like to introduce myself, Arthur LY, currently in my second year of a BTECH, specializing in Software Solutions and Business Applications (SLAM). Passionate about the creative world of programming, application development and video games, I have focused my academic career on acquiring advanced skills in the design, deployment and maintenance of software solutions.

projects.title: ADP - Automatic Data Processing
projects.description: As a member of the R&D team, I undertook a project to redesign the home page. I created an Oracle database to optimize information storage, and established the link between the newly created database and the web server using servlets. At the same time, I extended the functionalities by introducing key elements such as bookmark management and a history.

projects.title: AAE - Académie de l'Air et de l'Espace
projects.description: En tant que membre de l'équipe de R&D, j'ai entrepris un projet de refonte de la page d'accueil. J'ai créé une base de données sous Oracle pour optimiser le stockage des informations et ai établi le lien entre la base de données nouvellement créée et le serveur web à l'aide de servlet. En parallèle, j'ai élargi les fonctionnalités en introduisant des éléments clés tels que la gestion de favoris et un historique.

experience.company: AAE - Academy of Air and Space
experience.title: Second year BTS SIO internship
experience.description: Mobile application design and website development

experience.title: First year BTECH internship
experience.description: Redesign of the home page of R&D tools and their environments.

experience.title: Internship
experience.description: Discover all the activities and services of a large company
